Proof General

 
START-INFO-DIR-ENTRY 
* Proof General: (ProofGeneral).          Organize your proofs with Emacs!
END-INFO-DIR-ENTRY

This file documents version 3.7 of Proof General, a generic Emacs interface for proof assistants.

Proof General 3.7 has been tested with XEmacs 21.5.28 and GNU Emacs 22.2.1. It is supplied ready to use for the proof assistants LEGO, Coq, Isabelle, and PhoX. Experimental support is provided for several other provers.
